tag_list: saas, recovery, turnaround, assessment, startup, new-zealand
overview:
Sean is a business technology professional, with international experience primarily in the Asia Pacific region â€“ including starting, turning around and managing technology businesses in several large emerging markets. He is founder of SaaS eAssessment startup avancert.com and co-founder of ehire.asia.

He has held positions as CIO, CTO and Director for multinational software and ICT services companies in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, Hong Kong and China. He is currently the owner of Advancer Limited a New Zealand company providing technology consulting services in the Asia Pacific region. Advancer Limited is also the holding company for several software as a service startups.

His specialties include Agile applications development, enterprise architecture design, Software as a Service and consulting on technology “right sizing”, financial turnaround of distressed technology companies and strategy.
